attributes.title: Trusts in DEATH BATTLE Yoda Does!

attributes.title: Steven Universe is a Gem in DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.description: Half-boy, half-gem, all heart! Steven of the Crystal Gems is ready to protect his friends and the rest of the universe!

attributes.title: Cloud SOLDIERs Up for DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.description: Gotham City's Caped Crusader is back once again, this time for a blistering battle of the billionaires!

attributes.title: Goku Black Judges DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: Reverse-Flash Zooms into DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: Macho Man Snaps into DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.description: OOOOOOOHHHHH YEEEEEEAAAAH THE MA-CHO MAN RANDY SAVAGE IS HERE TO PUT THE HURTIN ON WHOEVER STEPS UP TO FACE ME OOOOOOH YEAAAAAHHHH

attributes.title: Kool-Aid Man Breaks into DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: DIO Road Rolls Over DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: Shao Kahn Konquers DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: Korra Reincarnates into DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: Storm Electrifies DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: Madara is Back From the Dead for a DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: Saitama Only Needs One Punch for DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.description: Will Saitama finally get the fight he's always wanted, or will he end this Death Battle in one punch?

attributes.title: Popeye Is What He Is in DEATH BATTLE!
